annotation_sentence: Hello! Um, I not have plan yet. Why you ask?

annotation_sentence: Ah, yes! I think about Thai restaurant... um, the one with spicy food? How to say... famous for tom yum?

annotation_sentence: Yes, Spicy Thai Kitchen! I hear it is very good.

annotation_sentence: Hmm, maybe we can go... how to say... see movie?

annotation_sentence: I not sure. Maybe new action movie? Many people say good.

annotation_sentence: Yes, please. I like action movies. They are exciting.

annotation_sentence: I think... um, meet restaurant is easier, right?

annotation_sentence: Thank you so much. I look forward to it.
